scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run deploy && npm run decl && cd frontend && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.create-canisters: dfx canister create main --no-wallet --identity anonymous && dfx canister create assets --no-wallet --identity anonymous
scripts.deploy: dfx canister stop main --identity anonymous && dfx deploy main --no-wallet --identity anonymous && dfx canister start main --identity anonymous && npm run decl
scripts.replica: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && npm run create-canisters
scripts.decl: npm run decl:cli && npm run decl:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:cli && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.postinstall: (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd cli && npm install)
